InsertConstructionStructure.Title: Create Construction Assembly
InsertConstructionStructure.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Construction Assembly</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.

CreateStructureAndScope.Title: Create Construction Structure and Scope Link
CreateStructureAndScope.ShortHelp: Creates a Construction Structure with a scope link to a product or a part.
CreateStructureAndScope.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and click <uicontrol>Create Construction Structure and Scope Link</uicontrol> to create a construction structure with a scope link to a product or a part.

CreateWorkPackageEachAndScope.ShortHelp: Creates a Work Package with a scope link to a product or a part.
CreateWorkPackageEachAndScope.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and click <uicontrol>Create Work Package and Scope Link</uicontrol> to create a construction structure with a scope link to a product or a part.

CreateStructureAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Construction Assembly and Resulting Product Link
CreateStructureAndResultingProduct.Short: Creates a Construction Assembly and a resulting product link.
CreateStructureAndResultingProduct.LongH: Click <uicontrol>Create Construction Assembly and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.

Click <uicontrol>Create Work Package Group and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.

AssignStructure.Title: Assign Product to Construction Assembly
AssignStructure.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a Construction assembly.
AssignStructure.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a Construction Assembly and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.

UnassignProduct.Title: Unassign Product
UnassignProduct.ShortHelp: Unassigns a product or a part from a construction item.
UnassignProduct.LongHelp: Select a product or a part, and click <uicontrol>Unassign Product</uicontrol> to remove it from the construction item.
